name: Base Blaster (4-hour Jam)
description:
Base Blaster is a shooter game that is also a tower defense game made in the incredibly long period of 4 hours. 

One player plays as a space ship, controlled with wasd, while the other plays the enemy, putting out towers with the mouse in order to protect the base. 

**This game was made in 4 hours.**

NOTE: Linux and macOS builds are untested.

Controlls

Player1 (Ship) moves with WASD and shoots with space or up arrow

Player2 (Base) uses the mouse to click and drag towers onto the screen.
